section.title: Verify operation
section.para: This section describes how to verify operation of the Block Storage service by creating a volume.
For more information about how to manage volumes, see the OpenStack User Guide.

note.para: Perform these commands on the controller node.

step.para: Source the demo tenant credentials to perform these steps as a non-administrative tenant:

If the status does not indicate available, check the logs in the /var/log/cinder directory on the controller and volume nodes for more information.

note.para: The launch an instance chapter includes instructions for attaching this volume to an instance.
